²² PLOT SUMMARY ²²                                                                                           

Streetwise mobster-turned-movie producer Chili Palmer is             
back, but this time Chili has abandoned the fickle movie             
industry and  veered into  the music business,  tangling             
with  Russian mobsters  and gangsta rappers and taking a             
talented, feisty young singer named Linda Moon under his             
wing. From  the recording studio to an Aerosmith concert             
to the MTV Music Awards,  he manipulates events to watch             
them  play out the Chili way, using  his signature blend             
of  wiseguy  skills  and  negotiation  tactics.  It's  a             
dangerous business, and  everyone's  looking  for  their             
next big hit.

I think the Ac3 codec is really bad. I remember having horrible sound for some of the Neon Genesis Evangelion series because of the AC3. SO i have the 0.7 AC3 codec and it still sounds realllllly bad, i dont think its improved by having more speakers (creative _ audgiy 2 soundcard). Am i just using this codec incorrectly?

Also I would like to know why the files are .rar format too, although it doesn't bother me much (its piss easy to extract them) it just doesnt seem to save any space and you can attach things to .rar files and corrupt them etc etc. Isn't this just generally a bad idea? I understand the storage aspect but it isn't actually saving much space :P Bins Are a good idea, but why .rar the bins? This is a serious question, i wouldn't mind a serious answer :D

The files are split into multiple rars because if your single file corrupts you'll have to download the whole thing again, but with multiple rars you only need to download the rars that are corrupt.

For example - you download a 700mb bin file, for some reason it is corrupt when downloaded. You'd have to grab the whole 700mb again!
But if the 700 mb was split into 100x7mb rar files and you discover that rar file 69 is corrupt you only have to download 7mb to get the files working.

Hope that explains it to you.

Cheers,
71M
